body:
It should work.  Did you try it?  The main requirement is that your  
mist has a finite extent.  Beware that the sun is a lousy source for  
creating visible beams in a uniform fog, as it floods light  
everywhere.  Similarly, redirected light by mirrors will likely be  
drowned out by the scattering of sunlight throughout the participating  
medium, unless you have some way to reflect the light from unfoggy  
regions to foggy regions.


-Greg
